::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .g-col-md-4 .project-card}
**SurvivorPy**
<details>
	<summary>description</summary>
	I created a Python wrapper of an R dataset, providing easy access to comprehensive Survivor reality show data through pandas DataFrames. The package wraps data from the R survivoR package, auto-syncs daily, making it easy for Python users to explore the rich dataset curated by survivoR.
</details>
<a class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-sm" href="https://github.com/jonnycomes/survivorpy" role="button">repo</a>
:::


::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .g-col-md-4 .project-card}
**look_and_say**
<details>
	<summary>description</summary>
	I built a Python module to investigate the structure of look and say sequences beyond Conway's classical case. This led to my analysis of stuttering variants, whose growth rates are an algebraic integer of degree 415
</details>
<a class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-sm" href="https://jonnycomes.github.io/look_and_say/docs/look_and_say.html" role="button">module</a>
<a class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-sm" href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2206.11991" role="button">paper</a>
:::

**Hst**
<details>
	<summary>description</summary>

</details>
